comment.author: 73588512@N00
comment._content: Winnans should be Winans in title per the negative. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Walter_Winans

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Walter W. Winans, horseman, sculptor, painter, marksman, cosmopolite, was born in Russia to American parents, and spent his adult life in England: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2162693861/in/p... LOC -- his name in your title still requires correction.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Wystan:  Thanks for the information about Winans!  We'll add his full, correct name to the record next time we update.
